content: Citi Cash Back Insurance Lifestyle Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked 3w agoWill I get cash back if I use my Citi Cash Back for Grabpay and insurance?Was hoping to get more out of it apart from meeting the minimum spend.1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Elijah Lee, Independent Financial Advisor at Phillip Securities (Jurong East Lite)Top Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered 3w agoHi Anon, under  https://www.citibank.com.sg/global_docs/pdf/Cash-Back-FAQ.pdf  insurance (2 vi) and Grabpay (2 x) are specifically excluded from computation for the bonus cash back, but you should be able to get the 0.25% cashback on all other 'retail spend'. Having said that, most insurers only allow initial premium payment by Credit Card, so do take note.I'm not a cashback person, so this is based on my understanding of the T&Cs. The term 'retail spend' is a little vague though.0 comments6
